attributes.review: Just opening this app gave me nightmares for days!!! The first thing you see is a crusty Cheeto looking q-tip trying to pass as a human who then immediately asks for money like some welfare sucking pig. Do it yourself Donald—you’re supposed to be a capitalist legend that’s ~great~ with the economy. Why you asking me for support!!
attributes.title: Terrifying 🧚🏼‍♂️

attributes.review: With all this crap going on I wanted a good place to get news but app is run by Democrats pushing out fake news. Don’t download this app the Democrats are trying to brain wash you into thinking this has reliable news. Trump would not approve. Don’t listen to a bunch of baby whiners.

I don’t know who is in charge of betting apps to be on the AppStore, but apparently they need to be fired.  This app is so glitchy it crashed as soon as I pressed a button.  Needs to be removed from the AppStore until the developers fix these bugs.
attributes.title: Glitchy as hell!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to keep America great, but after opening up the app, I realised the app and everything it stands for is making America significantly worse!!! Not to mention the horrendous download time on my 5G internet.
attributes.title: HUGE disappointment! SAD!!!

attributes.review:
App won’t let me get past start screen.
Asks for mobile phone #. my phone is calling only, no digital plan so I can’t give it out for anything.
 I am saving money by only using iPad.
attributes.title: No phone

attributes.review: Took 4 days to download and started playing four💕in💕her and had a screen displayed saying 𝓲ᦔ ✨ꪗρꪊꪜꫀ 🥰ꫀꪜꫀ𝘳 😾᥇ꫀꫀꪀ 👄𝘴ꪀꪖ𝘬ꫀᦔ 😽᥇ꪗ 🌞ꪖ 🙀ᠻ𝘳𝓲ꫀꪀᦔ 😹𝓳ꪊ𝘴𝓽 💞ᠻꪮ𝘳 😍𝓽ꫝꫀ 👀ᥴꪶρꪊ𝓽 💀𝓽ꫝꫀꪗꪶꪶ🥺 ᦔꪮ 🙈𝓲𝓽 🤚ꪖᧁꪖ𝓲ꪀ for 7 hours. Then it connected to my microwave playing that for 7 days. Never downloading again! 😡
attributes.title: Very bad 😾

attributes.review: Downloaded the app and all of a sudden Russia has my test scores leading all the way back to second grade. Also heard the guy that this app is about is racist and I’m not about that. I was promised making this country great and was given less rights then this terrible app. NOT WORTH IT. TOOK BIGLY YEARS TO EVEN DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: DONT DO IT

attributes.review: So I was just walking up in place because my croissant wasn’t running and the app told me to catch it. Right when I was gonna catch it I get a notification telling me to vote for Kanye. And end up dropping my croissant.
attributes.title: It almost made me drop my croissant

attributes.review: I am underage. When I downloaded it, trump found out my number using data mining. He started to text me that he was home alone in the White House and he wanted me to come over. He proceeded to text me measly and inappropriate things towards me.
attributes.title: Just Awful

attributes.review: Honestly.. I am so disappointed by this app. I was hoping to just stay connected to the campaign, but no. They wanted so much personal information it felt like they just wanted my information. This app is a complete invasion of privacy and made me fear for the 1st amendment.
attributes.title: Yikes
